criteria.description: Reward function properly executes the expression and checks to see if the expression equals 24.
criteria.justification: Expression is safely evaluated via AST; exact match determined by abs(value-24) <= EPSILON and rewarded with EXACT_SOLUTION_REWARD.

criteria.description: Reward function makes sure that the expression uses all four digits exactly once.
criteria.justification: Digit usage verified with multiset equality (numbers_match_episode). Exact reward gated on used_all_digits; bonus for adherence.

criteria.description: Environment and prompting is setup to elicit thinking / reasoning in a <thinking> tag or some equivalent manner.
criteria.justification: Prompts require only a <solution> tag and explicitly forbid extra text; no thinking/reasoning channel provided.

criteria.description: Reward function is smooth, where even if the expression is not exactly 24, there is a positive reward for being close to 24.
criteria.justification: _smooth_reward provides a linear closeness signal clipped at CLIPPED_ERROR; near-misses receive positive reward plus small bonus for correct digit usage.

criteria.description: There is either a penalty for not following the formatting the prompt demands, or a reward for following the formatting the prompt demands.
criteria.justification: Missing/malformed <solution> XML or empty solution yields reward = -1.0 and marks invalid_solution, penalizing formatting violations.

notes: Robust safe evaluation and rule checks with clear metrics. No reasoning/<thinking> tag is present, which is the main missing rubric element.
